target.name: downloadTrace
target.description: Downloads files for Trace to BLASTSERVER_FASTA_FILE_PATH/TRACE.

target.name: convertTrace
target.description: Converts FASTA files for Trace into blastable files in /tmp or in BLASTSERVER_FASTA_FILE_PATH/Trace depending on mode.

target.name: pushTrace
target.description: Pushes blast files for Trace to production from BLASTSERVER_FASTA_FILE_PATH.

target.name: revertTrace
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the $BLASTSERVER_FASTA_FILE_PATH and from the BLASTSERVER_BLAST_DATABASE_PATH/Backup to BLASTSERVER_BLAST_DATABASE_PATH/Current.
